div.a: New Immunization Requirement for 7th Grade Entry
What's Going on in Food Services

b.font:
Due to potential rain tomorrow, April 23, student meals
will only be distributed from the Carriere Cafeteria location.
The distribution time will begin at 11:30 a.m. and conclude at 1:30 p.m.

font.b:
Per executive order of state-wide school closure by Governor Reeves,
all PRC schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

b.a: Pearl River County School District Pandemic Plan

b.font: Call Kelly Services at 228-831-2960 to apply.
New Immunization Requirement for 7th Grade Entry

font.font: *If you need further assistance, call the National Center for Homeless Education

div.font: at the toll-free number listed below:

div.span:
The Pearl River County School District offers equal employment opportunities to all persons regardless of gender, race, religion, national origin, or
handicapping conditions pursuant to federal and state regulations and subject to reasonable standards of employment.
